root.name: Tiny Toon Adventures 2: Montana's Movie Madness
root.description: Tiny Toon Adventures: Montana's Movie Madness was the second Tiny Toon Adventures related game ever released on the Nintendo Game Boy. It was released on December 31, 1993 in the US and November 25, 1994 in Japan and was developed and published by Konami.The main plot of the game sees Montana Max getting his own movie theatre. Though in every movie he is the hero and Buster Bunny is the villian. Its Buster's job to go into each film and change the plot. He is helped by Gogo Dodo, who appears in each movie. He then can get help from each of his friends.Each stage is a movie. There are five stages in total. With the first four being films and the final stage taken place outside the movie theatre. At the end of each satge, Buster must fight Montana, who is dressed in a costume suited to each movie. Buster also fights many other of his other famous enemies.
